Name: Fiendtini
Ingredients: 3.8 ml Pickle juice/brine/vinegar from pickled cucumber/gherkin
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A gin Martini 'dirtied' with pickled gherkin brine and garnished with a pickled gherkin.
Nutrition: One serving of Fiendtini contains 184 calories
